info.author: Luke Maurits
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Testing :: Traffic Generation
info.description:
HTTPeek is a tool for sending hand-crafted HTTP requests to web servers and
examining ("peeking into") the details of their response. It is designed to
assist web server developers in testing the features of their servers which
cannot easily be tested using an ordinary browser. HTTPeek is written in Python
and has a GUI built using the Tkinter toolset.
info.name: HTTPeek
info.summary: A GUI tool for hand-crafting HTTP requests and examinig responses to them.
info.html_description: HTTPeek is a tool for sending hand-crafted HTTP requests to web servers and examining (“peeking into”) the details of their response. It is designed to assist web server developers in testing the features of their servers which cannot easily be tested using an ordinary browser. HTTPeek is written in Python and has a GUI built using the Tkinter toolset.
